item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Not dead yet, although, at times, I have wished I was.
Vacay for a week, now on the road for work. And, as I have discovered, vacationers/business travelers are only allowed a MAXIMUM of 120 seconds per day of alone time.
Most days, I spent my 120 seconds running two miles away from all humans so that I could have a smoke without fear of wafting a puff or two of secondhand carcinogens on others. Other days ... well, never mind that.
At any rate, even this whirlwind tour of the United States can't last forever, and I'll be drinking alone again very soon.
item.content:encoded:
Not dead yet, although, at times, I have wished I was.

Vacay for a week, now on the road for work. And, as I have discovered, vacationers/business travelers are only allowed a MAXIMUM of 120 seconds per day of alone time.

Most days, I spent my 120 seconds running two miles away from all humans so that I could have a smoke without fear of wafting a puff or two of secondhand carcinogens on others. Other days … well, never mind that.

At any rate, even this whirlwind tour of the United States can’t last forever, and I’ll be drinking alone again very soon.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Haha. My favorite part is when Hitler calls America a hax0r.
Hitler[AoE]: wtf Hitler[AoE]: america hax, u had depression and now u got a huge fockin army Hitler[AoE]: thats bullsh1t u hacker
And let that be a lesson to you future world leaders: nothing pulls a country out of a depression like ginormous defense spending.
